metadata.title: CVE-2024-47710 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:sock_map: Add a cond_resched() in sock_hash_free()Several syzbot soft lockup reports all have in common sock_hash_free()If a map with a large number of buckets is destroyed, we need to yieldthe cpu when needed.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
